http://knowledgelinks.io/ns/data-structu.http://knowledgelinks.io/ns/data-structu: SELECT ?s ?name { ?user a kds:UserClass . ?user kds:hasPerson ?s . ?s schema:givenName ?givenName . ?s schema:familyName ?familyName . ?s schema:email ?email . BIND (CONCAT(?familyName,'-',?givenName,'-',?email) AS ?name) . } ORDER BY ?name

https://schema.org/givenName.http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com: First name or given name for an individual.

http://knowledgelinks.io/ns/data-structu.http://knowledgelinks.io/ns/data-structu: SELECT * { ?s a schema:Organization . ?s schema:name ?name . } ORDER BY ?name

https://schema.org/familyName.http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com: Last name or family name for an individual.

http://knowledgelinks.io/ns/data-structu.http://knowledgelinks.io/ns/data-structu: SELECT ?s ?name { ?s a schema:Person . ?s a schema:givenName ?givenName . ?s a schema:familyName ?familyName . BIND (CONCAT(?familyName,', ',?givenName) AS ?name . OPTIONAL { ?u a kds:UserClass . ?u kds:hasPerson ?s . } FILTER (!(bound(?s)) } ORDER BY ?name
Enter Password: Minimum 16 characters with 2 uppercase, 2 lowercase and 2 special characters.
